name: Darwins Trash
description:
Darwins Trash is an intruiging and intense roguelite puzzle shooter than will have you scratching your head in delight. Shoot your way out of the caves while encountering insane foes, devilish tricksters, and willing helpers along the way. Sift through endless piles of loot - some uber valuable, some complete junk. A replayable masterpiece, you WILL want to enter this cave endlessly in pursuit of the ultimate goal - destroying Darwin's trash.

An intimate single-player experience with endless replayability, you WILL be re-entering the cave to discover exactly what lies inside - if you dare. No two playthroughs of this randomly generated dungeon will ever be the same, and you will never be the same after experiencing the delights and dangers of this insane journey. Do you dare seek the trash at the heart of this insidious piece of software?

With full controller support, achievements, leaderboards, high scores, quests, and so much more!
